name: Phantasmat: Behind the Mask Collector's Edition
name_original: Phantasmat: Behind the Mask Collector's Edition
description:
Phantasmat: Behind the Mask Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It was originally released in 2015. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Phantasmat: Behind the Mask Collector's Edition on PC.
